participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Confident, sociable, and competitive. Enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I went to college in maryland. I live in huge mansion. I make 35 million a year. I am a professional basketball player. I play for the washington wizards.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving, creative, and outgoing. Enjoys exploring different activities and sharing them with friends.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is orange. I love gummy bears. I have a parakeet. I have 3 roommates. I am lactose intolerant.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to go to concerts and play video games.
I'm a big fan of video games too! What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Overwatch.
I've heard of Overwatch, but I haven't played it yet. Is it fun?
It's a lot of fun! It's a first-person shooter where you play as different heroes with different abilities.
That sounds cool! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to go to concerts. I've been to a few concerts this year, and they've all been really good.
That's awesome! I love going to concerts too. Who have you seen lately?
I saw Twenty One Pilots a few weeks ago, and they were amazing.
I love Twenty One Pilots! I've seen them a few times, and they always put on a great show.
They're so good live! I'm so glad I got to see them.
Me too! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to watch movies and TV shows.
Me too! What kind of movies and TV shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch a lot of different things, but my favorite genres are action, comedy, and horror.
I like those genres too! I'm a big fan of superhero movies and comedies.
Me too! I love superhero movies, and I'm always looking for new comedies to watch.
Me too! What are some of your favorite comedies?
I love The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Brooklyn Nine-Nine.
Me too! I love all of those shows!
They're so funny! I'm always laughing when I watch them.
Me too! I love comedies that make me laugh.
Me too! They're the best.
